head.title: New Chairman for Victoria and Albert

hedline.hl1: New Chairman for Victoria and Albert

block.p: Prime Minister Tony Blair of Britain yesterday appointed John Tusa chairman of the Victoria and Albert Museum. Mr. Tusa, who will begin his four-year term on Nov. 1, is the managing director of the Barbican Center in London and was previously the managing director of the BBC World Service. He is the author of two books on the arts and has been the chairman of the advisory committee to the Government Art Collection, a trustee of the National Portrait Gallery and the Design Museum and deputy chairman of the English National Opera. He was knighted in 2003.
